data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Tobago, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Scarborough
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Scarborough, Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago.
Spirit, teach the 330,078 believers in Tobago that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Tobago that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, help 279 new simple churches start among the 1,399,500 people in the state of Tobago, Trinidad and Tobago. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
